full_text: Block I. - Information About Alien Beneficiary (Continued) 21. Address in the United States where beneficiary will reside (City) (State) 315 W. Grand Avenue, Alhamara, California 91801 22. Address at which beneficiary is presently residing (Apt. No.) (Number and street) (Town or city) (Province or State) (Zip Code, if in U.S.) 315 W. Grand Avenue, Alhambra, California 91801 23. If beneficiary is in the United States, give the following information concerning beneficiary: a. He last arrived in the U.S. on b. He last arrived in U.S. as C. Show date beneficiary's stay expired or will (Month) (Day) (Year) (Visitor, student, exchange alien, crewman, stowaway, etc.) expire as shown on his Form I-94 or I-95: July 16, 1973 Visitor November 15, 1973 d. Name and address of present employer e. Date alien began this employment None in U. S. 24. Check the appropriate box below and furnish the information required for the box checked: Beneficiary will apply for a visa abroad at the American Consulate in (CITY IN FOREIGN COUNTRY) (FOREIGN COUNTRY) Beneficiary is in the United States and will apply for adjustment of status to that of a lawful permanent resident in the Office of the Immigration and Naturalization Service at Los Angeles, California (CITY) (STATE) If the application for adjustment of status is denied, the beneficiary will apply for a visa abroad at the American Consulate in Tokyo, Japan. (CITY IN OREIGN COUNTRY) (FOREIGN COUNTRY) 2 for Block 11. - Information About Petitioner 25. My name is ALasty (First) (Middle) 26. Other names used; married (including woman) maiden name if YING Kwei Yen Chang CHANG Kwei Yen 27. I reside in the United States at (Apt. No.) (Number and street) (Town or city) (State) (ZIP Code) 315 W. Grand Avenue, Alhambra, California 91801 28. Address abroad (if any) (Number and street) (City or town) (Province) (Country) None 29. I was born: (Month) (Day) (Year) In: (City or town) (State or Province) (Country) pet. 12, 1922 Shanghai Kiangsu China 30. If you are a citizen of the United States, give the following: a. Citizenship was acquired: (Check one) through birth in the U. S. through parents through naturalization through marriage (1) If acquired through naturalization, give name under which naturalized, number of naturalization certificate, and date and place of naturalization 13 (2) If acquired through parentage or marriage, have you obtained a certificate of citizenship in your own name based on such acquisition (a) If so, give number of certificate and date and place of issuance: 12.13. (b) If not, submit evidence of citizenship in accordance with Instruction 3a.(2). b. Have you or any person through whom you claim citizenship ever lost United States citizenship? of If so, attach detailed explanation on separate sheet. 31. If you are a lawful permanent resident alien of the United States, give the following: a. Alien Registration Number: b. Date, place, and means of admission for lawful permanent residence A 20 281 687 8/17/73 - Adj. Sec 245, I&N Act - Los Angeles, Calif c. Have you ever lost status as a lawful permanent resident alien? 13 1313 No. If so, explain: (If you are married to a citizen of the United States, read instruction 1b carefully) 32. Have you attached all required documents (see instruction No. 3)? Yes Block III. - Oath or Affirmation of Petitioner I swear (affirm) that I know the contents of this petition signed by me and that the statements herein are true and correct. Subscribed and RU sworn to W (affirmed) LCU before mo this 12th day & ying A.O. 19 73 at San Francisco, CA OFFICIAL L Signature of petitioner (See Instruction No. 5) view (SEAL) Myccommission expires area My Commission Expire Feb. 7. 10.7 (SIGNATURE OFFICER ADMINISTERING OATH) (TITLE) Block IV. - Signature of Person Preparing Form, If Other Than Petitioner I declare that this document was prepared by me at the request of the petitioner and is based on all information of which I have any knowledge. 11/12/73 (SIGNATURE) (ADDRESS) (DATE)
